front.title: Guide for application developers on session continuity by using MIF API

abstract.t: Today most smart terminals are equiped with multiple interfaces such as 3G/LTE and Wifi, users experience some application broken during switching interfaces. MIF API draft [I-D.ietf-mif-api-extension] has specified some API to announce interface on/off information to the applications. Once the application received those information, it can re-connect to the servers which could improve session continuity experience in some extent.
